title: Ticket #1597: condor_userlog cores on unwritable file
description:
$ condor_version
$CondorVersion: 7.4.4 Aug  9 2010 BuildID: RH-7.4.4-0.9.el5 PRE-RELEASE $
$CondorPlatform: X86_64-LINUX_F13 $
$ touch log
$ condor_userlog log
Host/Job        Wall Time Good Time CPU Usage Avg Alloc  Avg Lost Goodput
Util.
Total             0+00:00   0+00:00   0+00:00   0+00:00   0+00:00    0.0%
0.0%
$ chmod a-w log
$ condor_userlog log
zsh: segmentation fault (core dumped)  condor_userlog log
check_ins: 2010-Aug-23 10:47   Check-in [18857]: Fixed core dump in condor_userlog when trying to read from a user event log that is not writable, #1597 Committer: Matthew Farrellee (By Jon Thomas )
creator: matt
